definition: having the characteristics of an acid, street name for lysergic acid diethylamide
details:
adjective
- having the characteristics of an acid
= example: having the characteristics of an acid
- harsh or corrosive in tone
= synonyms: bitter
- being sour to the taste
= synonyms: acidic
noun
- street name for lysergic acid diethylamide
= synonyms: back breaker, battery-acid, dose, dot, loony toons, pane, superman, window pane
- any of various water-soluble compounds having a sour taste and capable of turning litmus red and reacting with a base to form a salt
